summary: An ordinance levying a special assessment to redeem the annual installments and interest to mature and become payable upon the bonds of Local Improvement District No. 100 issued under authority of Ordinance No. 3900 for the improvement of Lincoln Street and John Street, under Ordinance No. 3728 in accordance with the assessment roll of said district as approved by Ordinance No. 3859 providing for the collection thereof, and providing penalties for non-payment at maturity.
